text: María Rubio (September 20, 1934 – March 1, 2018) was a Mexican television, movie and stage actress. She worked with Televisa as an actress of telenovelas. She was born in Tijuana, Baja California. She was known for her roles in ¡Vivan los niños!, Salomé, Querida enemiga and in Una familia con suerte as Inés De la Borbolla y Ruiz. She retired in 2012. Rubio died in Mexico City on March 1, 2018 at the age of 83.Muere María Rubio, la actriz que interpretó a Catalina Creel en 'Cuna de Lobos' ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:People from Baja California (state)
title: María Rubio
